description.value:
Rite of Ostracism
Punishment Rite (Level 2) • Caern

Time: 1 hour
Cost: 3 Gnosis
Target: One Garou

Description

The Rite of Ostracism formally separates a Garou from their pack and sept in the eyes of the spirits. Though the offender remains physically present, the spirit world no longer recognizes them as part of the whole.

Effect

If the target fails their saving throw, they are ostracized for one Caern Turn.

While ostracized, the target:

  • Cannot benefit from: Totem Pack Benefits; Caern bonuses; pack-based features or abilities
  • Is treated by spirits as an outsider

The target retains full agency and may act normally.

Resisting a Punishment Rite

If this rite targets an unwilling creature, the target may attempt to resist. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw. Save DC = 8 + the performing Garou's Max Gnosis Rating. On a success, the Rite fails and has no effect (the Gnosis cost is still spent). On a failure, the Rite takes full effect. Willing targets do not make a saving throw.

Ending the Rite

The Rite ends early if the target:

  • Publicly acknowledges their wrongdoing, or
  • Completes a Storyteller-approved act of atonement
